Html:
Hellow all,

 I was hoping there is a tutorial for an essential beginner to start using PHPExcel.

I have some Excel macros that I am trying to put online and need to know how to have the user to enter threir data into an Excel sheet or to upload their files,

run my macros and present a resulting report as a .pdf file or Excel file to the user.

Thank you,

Olga
